name: Yield Yak
challengeDesc: Yield Yak supports dozens of platforms for auto-compounding, and has also developed single-asset lending optimisation strategies, where single-assets were ‘folded’ multiple times in order to maximize yield on lending platforms such as Benqi, AAVE, and Trader Joe.
benefitIntro: Our team has fully integrated Yield Yak into our platform.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX, for trading anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: Introduce an Avlanache Push Notification System (APNS.io) for greater mobile user engagement.
benefit3: Experienced traders have new and better tools.
benefitClose: Our team is looking for more integrations.
